name: Fixing The Revolution
description:
Go on a quest to find the broken pieces of the Revolution!

Control, not one, not two, but three, characters with different backgrounds who embark on a quest in search of the pieces of the Revolution!!

This game was made with Godot for the Godot Wild Jam. 

I wanted to begin learning both Godot and Pixel art and thought about combining the two for this jam. The game is far from complete, but it provides a good basis for what is to come.

Controls:

Move Right: Right Key

Move Left: Left Key

Jump: Up Key

Skip Dialogue: Right Key

All assets, music, programming and art done by: Jonas
